title: Cancun Tracker
body:
| EIP	| PR | Merged
| ------------- | ------------- |  ------------- |
[Driver EIP] [EIP-4844: Shard Blob Transactions](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844) |Multiple PRs, check https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/issues/4558
[Included EIP] [EIP-1153: Transient storage opcodes](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153)|https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/4126  | ✅ 
[Included EIP] [EIP-6475: SSZ Optional](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6475) | |
[Included EIP] [EIP-6780: SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6780)| https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/4704 | 
[Considered EIP] [EIP-2537: Precompile for BLS12-381 curve operations](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2537)  |  |✅  *
[Considered EIP] [EIP-4788: Beacon state root in the EVM](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788)| | 
[Considered EIP] [EIP-6493: SSZ Transaction Signature Scheme](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493)| | 
[ENGINE API] [Add getPayloadV3 with builder override flag](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/395/files)|

SSZification all links:
https://hackmd.io/y1MCA5Q-R4eMVyOBHiRH7Q


\* EIP-2537 is implemented. However, we have to recheck the code and EIP. We should consider updating the crypto library: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/tree/master/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/Precompiles/Bls/Shamatar

Cancun discussion thread:
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/cancun-network-upgrade-meta-thread/12060/9
